Original_Text: BAGHDAD (Reuters) - A car bomb exploded near a market in Baghdad on Tuesday, killing 12 civilians and wounding 25 others, Iraqi police reported.
GAZA STRIP (AFP) - Israeli forces conducted overnight raids in the Gaza Strip, targeting militant hideouts after rocket attacks on southern Israel.
IRAQ (AP) - U.S. and Iraqi troops launched a joint operation in northern Iraq to dismantle insurgent networks linked to recent bombings.
BAGHDAD - Gunmen kidnapped a foreign aid worker in Baghdad, demanding the release of detained militants, according to local authorities.
GAZA STRIP (Reuters) - Palestinian factions in the Gaza Strip agreed to a temporary ceasefire to allow humanitarian aid deliveries amid ongoing clashes.
IRAQ (AFP) - A suicide bomber targeted a military checkpoint in Iraq, killing five soldiers and injuring eight in the volatile Anbar province.
BAGHDAD (AP) - Iraqi forces clashed with insurgents in a Baghdad suburb, resulting in 15 deaths and the destruction of a militant safehouse.
GAZA STRIP - An Israeli airstrike in the Gaza Strip killed three Palestinian militants, escalating tensions in the region, medics said.
IRAQ (Reuters) - The Iraqi government announced new security measures in Iraq to curb violence ahead of national elections scheduled for next month.
BAGHDAD (AFP) - A mortar attack on a Baghdad mosque killed seven worshippers, prompting calls for increased protection of religious sites.
